requests.name: GET document (default)
requests.description: Get a document specified with key, since no bucket specified, default is used

requests.name: ADD document
requests.description: Add a new document with key, post raw JSON, should follow structured formatting provided.

requests.name: INCR counter with create (default)
requests.description: Increment counter by 1, create if doesn't exist

requests.name: REPLACE document
requests.description: Do a replace operation replacing document with new json document

requests.name: DELETE document
requests.description: DELETE the key-value pair

requests.name: INCR counter by amount
requests.description: Increment counter by amount, include bucket explicitly

requests.name: INCR counter with create and amount (default)
requests.description: Increment counter by amount, create at 0 if doesn't exist

requests.name: SET single value
requests.description: Add a new document with key, post raw JSON, should follow structured formatting provided. For single values, just put value in value field.

requests.name: SET document with cas
requests.description: Do a set operation, providing a CAS for optimistic concurrency

requests.name: INCR counter
requests.description: Increment counter by 1, include bucket explicitly

requests.name: DECR counter by amount
requests.description: Decrement counter by amount, explicit bucket name

requests.name: REPLACE with single value
requests.description: Do a replace operation replacing document with simple data type

requests.name: DECR counter by amount (default)
requests.description: Decrement counter by amount, omit bucket name and use default

requests.name: GET document (bucket)
requests.description: Get a document specified with key, since no bucket specified, default is used

requests.name: DELETE document (default)
requests.description: DELETE the key-value pair, omit bucket name, use default

requests.name: REPLACE document with cas
requests.description: Do a replace operation, providing a CAS for optimistic concurrency

requests.name: SET document
requests.description: Add a new document with key, post raw JSON, should follow structured formatting provided. For single values, just put value in value field.

requests.name: ADD single value
requests.description: Add a new document with key, post raw JSON, should follow structured formatting provided. For single values, just put value in value field.

requests.name: DECR counter
requests.description: Decrement counter by 1, include bucket explicitly

requests.name: INCR counter by amount (default)
requests.description: Increment counter by amount
